GCash Overseas allows Filipinos living abroad to register with an international SIM card and access financial services in the Philippines.

You're eligible to create a GCash Overseas account if you are:

- A Filipino citizen who is 18 years old or older
- An owner of a valid [Philippine government-issued ID](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-List-of-Valid-IDs-to-get-Fully-Verified)
- Living abroad where [GCash OverseasÂ is available](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753833785241-GCash-Overseas-Available-Services-and-Countries)
- An owner of a valid international mobile number

Here's how to register for GCash Overseas

1\. Download the GCash App via the [Playstore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.globe.gcash.android&hl=en&gl=US)/ [App Store.](https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/gcash/id520020791)

2\. Open your GCash app, select the country of your SIM card, and input your mobile number. Tap **Next**

![11.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/28791552649753)

3\. Enter the 6-digit OTP sent to your mobile number. Tap **Submit**

4\. Input all the information needed and select **Next**

5\. Set your MPIN and tap **Submit**

![55.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/28791544324249)

6\. Review your information and tap **Confirm**

7\. You'll be led to a page that prepares you to get your GCash Overseas account Fully Verified.

8\. You will be sent an SMS regarding the status of your application.

After registering, get your account [**Fully Verified**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753574565145-Get-Fully-Verified-with-GCash-Overseas) to start using GCash Overseas.
